description: Numbers n such that there exists a pair of mutually orthogonal Latin squares of order n.
comments: n such that there exists a pair of orthogonal 1-factorizations of K_{n,n}.
references: B. Alspach, K. Heinrich and G. Liu, Orthogonal factorizations of graphs, pp. 13-40 of Contemporary Design Theory, ed. J. H. Dinizt and D. R. Stinson, Wiley, 1992.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 07 2000
